author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-4700: Add method to obtain a bogus port in TestConfiguration
Made bogus port static so that it can be shared across TestConfiguration instances.
Increased the maximum port count to 20 (we're currently using 11 in suites.All).

author: elecharny
msg: o Small improvement in the CollectiveAttributeInterceptor
o Port numbers are now selected to avoid a collision in the server-annotation tests
o Modified the printing of perf tests results
